body: @shamoya Is GDR available on Windows? I am actually pretty interested in porting my patch to Win32, as there are already some APIs like [Network Direct SPI](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc904397(v=vs.85).aspx) or [Network Direct Kernel Provider Interface](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-hardware/drivers/network/network-direct-kernel-programming-interface--ndkpi-). In a recent talk from MSR people, I heard that they could achieve pretty good improvement using RDMA to train RNN on CNTK, and I think it would be worth doing that on TF as well.
